name: White Noise 2
description: Enjoy a 4vs1 asymmetric horror experience like no other. Be a part of the investigator team, or take control of the creature and devour them!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 Processor: Dual Core processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10 capable hardware DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: 64bit OS recommended but not required
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Quad core processor Graphics: GeForce 660 or better DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
